sentences.en: Asteroidea ( starfish ) contains saponins, sterols, anthraquinones, alkaloids phospholipids and some other components.
sentences.cn: 海星含皂苷 、 甾醇 、 蒽醌 、 生物碱和脂类等物质.

sentences.en: At that very moment , she a difference for that starfish.
sentences.cn: 是的, “对这只海星来说,它的命运从此改变. ”

sentences.en: At that very moment, she was making a difference for that starfish.
sentences.cn: 在那一刻, 她改变了那只海星的命运.

sentences.en: Buy mobile phones to China West Gate , starfish head monk Road.
sentences.cn: 买手机到西华门, 海星和尚扑路.

sentences.en: Have you ever seen a starfish shining on the beach?
sentences.cn: 你是否见过海星闪烁在沙滩上?

sentences.en: I see a starfish in the sea.
sentences.cn: 我看到一只海星在海里.

sentences.en: I'm looking for a starfish. Here! I got one.
sentences.cn: 我在找海星. 有了, 我找到了.

sentences.en: In the oceans, you can find starfish and sea horses. They are interesting and beautiful sea animals.
sentences.cn: 在海洋中，你能看到海星以及海马，它们都是很有趣并且美丽的海洋动物。

sentences.en: Just think , so most of the ebb starfish were still alive.
sentences.cn: 以为刚刚退潮, 所以绝大部分的海星都还活着.

sentences.en: Now I'm looking for a starfish. And a seashell.
sentences.cn: 现在我要来找海星和贝壳.

sentences.en: One of the arms of a starfish or other radiate animal.
sentences.cn: 海星的足海星或其它多枝条动物的肢体之一.

sentences.en: One reason is their diet: They eat only starfish (and sometimes sea urchins), and they reportedly prefer to eat them alive.
sentences.cn: 原因之一是它们的饮食：它们只能吃到海星（有时是海胆），据报道它们喜欢吃活的。

sentences.en: She lays a kindly hand like a tiny starfish on my knee.
sentences.cn: 她和善地伸出手,像小海星一样放在我的膝盖上.

sentences.en: Starfish are actinoid -- that is, they are radially symmetrical.
sentences.cn: 海星呈放射性形状 —— 那就是说, 它们是呈对称的放射状.

sentences.en: The Starfish is one of the most curious creatures in the sea.
sentences.cn: 海星是海中最奇妙的生物.

sentences.en: We must each find out starfish.
sentences.cn: 我们每日都必须去发掘自己的海星.

trans.tran_en: a flat sea animal that has five arms forming the shape of a star
